values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
A big, fuzzy, triangle ear crowns [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound it senses.
A wonderfully fluffy fox tail drapes from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. Was that a small wag just then?

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: vulpine eye
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has bright, foxy eyes. [PAWN_pronoun] will see better, and charm people with their exotic appearance.
